column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I had no idea how blown away I would be by the food and experience at Bavette's. The atmosphere is so energetic and alive
column2: but not so loud that it can't be intimate at the same time. The entire staff is so friendly
column3: and explained the history and chemistry behind their drinks. The bread oh the bread
column5: and the inside is like no bread I have ever had
column6: it's dense but not heavy and creamy and moist. And then the steak
column8: melt in your mouth with a hint of the salty rub they use
column9: can't even describe the flavor! How I wish we would have had room for dessert! I can't wait to go back here
column10: I am going to be dreaming of this meal for a long long time.
